Class BluetoothSync

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.utilities.bluetooth.BluetoothSync

  • public class BluetoothSync
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  BluetoothSync.AcceptThread
      This thread runs while listening for incoming connections.
      private class  BluetoothSync.ConnectedThread
      This thread runs during a connection with a remote device.
      private class  BluetoothSync.ConnectThread
      This thread runs while attempting to make an outgoing connection with a device.
